ui.menu.lab8 package¶

Submodules¶

ui.menu.lab8.diagrams_menu module¶

Diagrams Menu Module

This module defines the DiagramMenu class, representing a

menu for displaying diagrams.

Attributes: - USERS_DATA: Constant variable for the path to user data.

Methods: - run(self): Run the diagram menu, allowing the user to choose different types of diagrams. - display_diagram(diagram_function): Display a diagram based on user input.

Usage: 1. Import the module: import ui.menu.lab8.diagrams_menu 2. Create an instance of DiagramMenu. 3. Run the menu using the run method.

Note: Ensure the required libraries (sys) are installed before using this module.

  • diagram. (and display the) –

None

run()¶

Run the diagram menu.

The menu allows the user to choose different types of diagrams to display and provides an option to exit the program.
